description: {"blocks":[{"key":"arfvq","text":"This protocol describes how to express and purify human NAP1 tagged C-terminally with mCherry.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
materials_text:
{"blocks":[{"key":"47qhk","text":"Expression:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"72v78","text":"pCAGG_GST-TEV-NAP1-mCherry (Addgene ID: 198036)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dqeu1","text":"FreeStyle™ 293-F Cells","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8s59q","text":"FreeStyle™ 293 Expression Medium (Thermo, 12338-026)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"78fmv","text":"Opti-MEMR I Reduced Serum Medium (Thermo, 31985-062)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3tm8u","text":"Polyethylenimine (PEI 25K, Polysciences CatNo 23966-1) 
EXCELLR 293 Serum-Free Medium (SigmaAldrich, 14571C-1000ML)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"63rfo","text":"PBS","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fr5mb","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5q2n5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2p1n4","text":"Lysis Buffer:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"78e8l","text":"50 mM Tris-HCl pH 8.0","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eds6o","text":"300 mM NaCl","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8ti3n","text":"2 mM MgCl2","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d8n5","text":"5% Glycerol","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c6ps","text":"2 mM b-Met","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9bmn4","text":"Complete inhibitor EDTA free Roche","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7c94e","text":"50ul of Protease inhibitors Sf9 cells","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"chmq6","text":"Benzonase (1ul)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c6abm","text":"
","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eib28","text":"Wash I Buffer:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fi4ca","text":"50 mM Tris-HCl pH  8.0","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2df1u","text":"300 mM NaCl","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ecjfn","text":"5% Glycerol","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fspjc","text":"1 mM DTT","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2v8fh","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7764v","text":"Wash II Buffer:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2t76e","text":"50 mM Tris-HCl pH  8.0","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"abaor","text":"700 mM NaCl","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cd6d7","text":"5% Glycerol","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bteol","text":"1 mM DTT
","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"619o3","text":"SEC Buffer:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dmhf9","text":"20 mM Tris-HCl pH  7.4","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e7uh3","text":"300 mM NaCl","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"94dqj","text":"1 mM DTT","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bh36g","text":"
","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"qj2s","text":"Columns/Resin:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7actn","text":"Glutathione Sepharose 4B (Cytiva)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"43np1","text":"Superose 6 Increase 10/300 column (Cytiva)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"cj5q6","text":"To generate GST-TEV-NAP1-mCh the gene coding for the protein sequence of human NAP1 was subcloned together with N-terminal GST-TEV and C-terminal mCherry tags into a pCAGG. The construct is available at AddGene with the ID: 198036.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"82a98","text":"The protein was expressed in FreeStyle™ 293-F Cells by transient transfection.The cells grown at 37°C in FreeStyle™ 293 Expression Medium (Thermo, 12338-026) were seeded to density of 0.7 x 10^6 cells per ml the day before transfection. On the day of transfection, 400 ml culture at density of 1x10^6 cells per ml was transfected by addition of vortexed transfection mixture. The mixture consisted of two components: 400 ug of the MAXI-prep DNA that was pre-diluted in 13 ml of FreeStyle™ 293 Expression Medium (Thermo, 12338-026) and 800 ug Polyethylenimine (PEI 25K, Polysciences CatNo 23966-1) likewise pre-diluted in 13 ml of Opti-MEM media. 24 hours post transfection, the culture was fed by addition of 100 ml of EXCELLR 293 Serum-Free Medium (SigmaAldrich, 14571C-1000ML). 24H post transfection, the cells were harvested by centrifugation at 270 g for 20 minutes, washed by 1xPBS and flash-frozenin liquid nitrogen prior to storage at -80 °C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d7erh","text":"Thaw a cell pellet corresponding to 1L culture by re-suspending it in 25 ml lysis buffer (50 mM Tris-HCl pH 8.0, 300mM NaCl, 2 mM MgCl2, 5% glycerol, 2 mM β-Met, 1 μl Benzonase (Sigma), CIP protease inhibitor (Sigma), cOmplete EDTA-free protease inhibitor cocktail (Roche)) and rolling or stirring in the cold room.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8eei5","text":"Additionally disrupt the cells with a Dounce homogenizer and two rounds of 30s sonication on ice.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f0kdu","text":"Clear the lysate by centrifugation (10 000 rpm for 45 min at 4°C in a Fiberlite F21-8x50y (Thermo Scientific)). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ma2g","text":"Incubate the cleared supernatant with 2 ml of Glutathione Sepharose 4B beads slurry (Cytiva) for 2h at 4°C rolling gently. The GSH slurry should be washed with water and then with Wash I Buffer beforehand (50 mM Tris-HCl pH 8.0, 300 mM NaCl, 5% glycerol, 1 mM DTT).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c411n","text":"After 2h of incubation with the cleared lysate wash the beads two times with Wash I Buffer (50 mM Tris-HCl pH 8.0, 300 mM NaCl, 5% glycerol, 1 mM DTT), once with Wash II buffer (50 mM Tris-HCl pH 8.0, 700 mM NaCl, 5% glycerol, 1 mM DTT) and again twice with Was I Buffer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cv1cn","text":"Incubate the beads overnight with TEV protease at 4°C (20 ul of 10 mg/ml home-made TEV). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"33gnj","text":"The next day spin down the beads (4000 rpm, 3 min, 4°C) and collect the supernatant containing cleaved NAP-mCh. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b86v0","text":"Filter the supernatant through a 0.45 μm syringe filter to remove any residual beads.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dvv7","text":"Concentrate the protein down to 0.5 ml using a 30kDa cut-off Amicon filter and apply onto a Superose 6 Increase column (10/300, Cytiva) pre-equillibrated with a SEC buffer containing 20 mM Tris-HCl, pH 7.4, 300 mM NaCl, and 1 mM DTT. Pool fractions containing pure proteins (see attached pdf), concentrate, snap freeze in liquid nitrogen, and store at −80°C. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: NAP1-mCherry
